inclusion.criterion: New or first recurrent diagnosed as major depression disorder.
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: depressive episode, unsuccessful suicide behavior 3 months ago
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: chronic another medical conditions (diabetes, hypothyroidism, pregnant, epilepsy, kidney failure, stroke, heart failure, liver failure, adrenal insufficiency)
exclusion.label: unknown

notes: Patient has been experiencing persistent feelings of sadness and loss of interest in daily activities for the past 6 months. She is currently on anti-depressants but still experiences symptoms.
